trait.name: Gnome Cunning
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Ortimay makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or Ortimay makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
text: Ortimay adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Ortimay must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
